component.name: AndView
component.summary: Android Device Manager with WiFi Connection Support

description.p: AndView is a modern GUI for managing Android devices using ADB and scrcpy. It provides an intuitive interface for developers and users who need to interact with Android devices from their desktop.

ul.li: Device list and management - View and manage connected Android devices
WiFi connection support - Connect to devices over WiFi without USB
Screen mirroring with scrcpy - High-quality screen mirroring and control
Quality settings and options - Customize video quality and performance
Multi-language support - Available in English, Spanish, and Portuguese
Modern Qt interface - Clean and responsive user interface

description.p: Perfect for Android developers, testers, and anyone who needs to interact with Android devices from their Linux desktop.

screenshot.caption: Main interface showing device list and connection options

description.p: Initial release of AndView with basic device management and screen mirroring capabilities.
